SavedView.description: Saved graph view snapshots for quick navigation

EventSubscription.description: Webhook subscription for graph mutation events. Configuration stored in metadata: filters (entity_kind, node_types, operations, keywords) and delivery (webhook_url, ignore_origins, ignore_session_ids)

Agent.description: AI agent configuration (runtime not implemented). Links to EventSubscription via metadata.subscription_id. Agent config in metadata.agent (type, config)

Actor.description: Government agencies, organizations, individuals responsible for initiatives

Resource.description: Outputs such as reports, software, tools, datasets. Field 'identifier' follows Dublin Core (dc:identifier) for URLs/URIs.

Theme.description: Themes like AI strategies, data strategies, digitalization

Goal.description: Strategic objectives and targets for digitalization efforts

Event.description: A non-persistent, time-based occurrence (aligned with dc:Event). Conferences, workshops, decisions, milestones.

BELONGS_TO.description: Belongs to (actor belongs to community, initiative belongs to actor)

PART_OF.description: Part of (component is part of larger whole)

AIMS_FOR.description: Aims for (initiative or actor aims for a goal)

presentation.title: Community Knowledge Graph
presentation.introduction: Explore the network of organizations, initiatives, and resources within the community collaboration.
presentation.prompt_prefix: You are a knowledge agent that helps users navigate and maintain a knowledge graph for community collaboration on public digitalization.
presentation.prompt_suffix: Remember to suggest saved views when relevant, and always ask for confirmation before making changes to the graph.
